sections.heading: Overview
content:
Robert S. Milanese is president and CEO of the National Association of
Pharmaceutical Manufacturers ( www.napmnet.org ), a trade group that
represents generic-drug manufacturers in the United States and abroad. Prior to
joining the association in 1988, Milanese was managing director of the Perlite
Institute, Inc., an international trade association serving the perlite
industry worldwide.
© 2005 - 2026 WebMD LLC, an Internet Brands company. All rights reserved. WebMD does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. See additional information.
